pageContext.claim: “I have to say, the crowd was unbelievable today. You know, I looked at the rain, which just never came. You know, we finished the speech, went inside, it poured.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump made these remarks at the Armed Services Post-Inauguration ball. It started raining during Trump's inaugural address. The audience could be seen putting on rain gear behind him as he spoke, most famously former president George W. Bush. This is a good example of the alternative reality that Trump often tries to create.
